< p > President Donald Trump told supporters at the National Rifle Association on Friday that the Second Amendment [V: will] " never ever be under siege as long as I am your president."

< p > President Donald Trump told supporters at the National Rifle Association on Friday that [ARG1: the Second Amendment] [ARGM-MOD: will] " [ARGM-TMP: never] [ARGM-TMP: ever] [V: be] [ARG2: under siege] [ARGM-TMP: as long as I am your] [ARGM-TMP: president."

< p > President Donald Trump told supporters at the National Rifle Association on Friday that the Second Amendment will " never ever be under siege as long as [ARG1: I] [V: am] [ARG2: your] president."
